title: Clip - Interview with Dennis Davis - What is Compelling about Zamm?
description:
#Pirsigs_Journey #Zen_and_the_Art_of_Motorcycle Maintenance

A clip from a longer interview with Filmmaker Dennis Davis, who is making a film entitled "Pirsig's Journey". Here is a link to the entire interview, where Dennis describes the film he's making, gives us some enlightening reflections about ZMM, and recounts his own motorcycle journey following Pirsig's route. Also, information as to how to help Dennis make this important and timely film. 

https://youtu.be/OOLSmCfH-yA
